results.name: Number of trailing 1-bits in the binary representation of A003961(n): a(n) = A007814(1+A003961(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 06 2020
